text: Hagi ana nanekema Devitima eme asamizageno'a, eri'za vahe'arami huzmantege'za e'za amanage hu'za ana vahetmina eme zamasami'naze, kini ne'mo'a amanage hie, Jeriko kumate mani'nenkeno tamagitamazoka'mo'a hagetena eho huno hu'ne. Na'ankure zamagrira tusi'a zamagazema hu avu'ava'ma huzmantegeno zamagazema hiazanku anagea hu'ne.
